questiontext.text:
Use Maclaurin series to calculate the following integral to 2 significant figures :
$$\small\int_0^1e^{x^2}$$dx

Answer :
{1:NUMERICAL:=1.4618:0.1#Good job!!~*#Incorrect, try again}

generalfeedback.text:
The Maclaurin expansion for ex = x + x^2/2 + x^3/6 + x^4/24 + x^5/120 + 1 ...
Integrating and Applying limits, we get $$\small\int_0^1e^{x^2}$$dx = 1.4618
